headline: ICVT: Mind The Bitcoin Exposure In This Converts Fund
summary: iShares Convertible Bond ETF is a convertible bond ETF with significant exposure to bitcoin via holdings. Click here to see why ICVT is a Hold.

headline: Horizon Kinetics Founders Letter 2025
summary: The year 2024 was quite extraordinary, with Bitcoin achieving institutional acceptance as the SEC gave permission to launch a variety of Bitcoin ETFs. Click here to read more.

headline: Above The Noise: Is The Worst Of Policy Uncertainty Behind Us?
summary: Investors were anticipating that Fed would cut interest rates 6 times by the end of the year. Fast-forward to some strong data releases, and all but one of the rate cuts have been priced out

headline: Third Circuit Chides SEC For Terse Refusal To Engage In Crypto Rulemaking
summary: On Jan. 13, 2025, a unanimous panel of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit held that the Securities and Exchange Commission violated the Administrative Procedure Act when it offered only...
